subject: Sports Injuries
Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Andy Dalton could return from a thumb injury to play in the postseason, but the Bengals will start his backup, A. J. McCarron, on Saturday against the Steelers.
snippet: Andy Dalton could return from a thumb injury to play in the postseason, but the Bengals will start his backup, A. J. McCarron, on Saturday against the Steelers.
